thread.title: $1.8M condo offers breathtaking views from big patio on 30th floor
thread.title_full: $1.8M condo offers breathtaking views from big patio on 30th floor

author: Jim Harger | jharger@mlive.com
title: $1.8M condo offers breathtaking views from big patio on 30th floor
text: With its clear glass railings, the big balcony is not for the faint of heart as traffic snakes by on the S-curve far below. The big deck includes an eight-person hot tub, a dining set and outdoor seating for those who want to relax and watch sunsets.
